resources.string: Viaplay GameCenter V 2.01_zh Powered by Viaplay Corporation
Use floating winows to capture screen?
Viaplay GameCenter can not get root access. Touch mapping functionality will not be available until the device is rooted
Check to show a floating window
The device needs to reboot, or can not properly use the mapping function of Viaplay GameCenter

Introduction:

 	 1.Viaplay GameCenter requires a rooted device. Please note that rooting 
 	 your device may void your warranty. Root at your own risk
 	 2.Make sure Viaplay GameCenter is the current InputMethod.
 	 3.Touch mapping:
 	 	 a. Press "select" & "start" key or click the floating window to start the Mapping UI.
 	 	 b. Touch the area that you want to map, and then press the key which you want
 	 	 to mapping with the selected screen area.
 	 	 c. If you want to mapping either Joysticks, touch at the center of the Virtual
 	 	 joystick,and then drag outward to adjust the area size. Move 
 	 	 the jostick to confirm you Mapping.
 	 	 d. Click the save button to save you Mapping.
\t Your device has not yet get root permissions, so can not use advanced functions like touch mapping, it would only support limited games. \n
